title: Only Two Remain...

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use the ability of a Daily Streak Faction role at night.
- Deal a Powerful attack to a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use both of your abilities at the same time.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see only two players remain.

desc:
Post 4791
*"Turns out this server isn't very good at consistently posting roles lol"*
